alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clearwater County through 900 PM PDT... At 759 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Mitchell, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orofino, Teakean, Ahsahka, Riverside and Dent. TIME...MOT...LOC 0259Z 055DEG 492KT 4442 12041 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region
